EmailTemplate.name: K-12 C2L Digital Marketing
EmailTemplate.subject: Committed to Learning with Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you again for speaking with me today.
As discussed, we are so excited to announce that Office Depot has just launched our own Committed to Learning website for a holistic approach to education solutions.
Committed to Learning integrates Office Depot's education-focused contract division with a wealth of best-in-class partners across the instructional ecosystem of people, classrooms, content data and materials. Personalizing the learning journey.
Please click COMMITTED TO LEARNING to see what we have brought to you.
Let me know if you have any questions.
THANK YOU!
{!User.Name}
Account Manager
{!User.Email}
(855)DEPOT11 ext. {!User.ISO_Extension__c}
https://business.officedepot.com
Customer Service: (888) 263-3423
